description: 1960 PONTIAC BONNEVILLE CONVERTIBLE.
BARN / ESTATE FIND IN NORTH CAROLINA.
389-4, AUTOMATIC TRANS, LEATHER INTERIOR, POWER STEERING, RADIO, STEEL SKIRTS, POWER WINDOWS, POWER TOP, RARE 8 LUG WHEELS. VERY SOLID BODY AND FLOORS.
WE BOUGHT THIS WITH 2 OTHER 60 PONTIACS, ONE BUBBLE TOP BONNE AND ONE 4 DOOR FLAT TOP. THESE WILL BE FOR SALE SOON.

THIS ONE HAS BEEN GONE THROUGH WITH THE MECHANICS. NEW BRAKES AND WHEELS REDONE, ALL OF THE FLOORS WERE STEAM CLEANED AND PAINTED, ENGINE HAD MAJOR SERVICE, ALL NEW DUAL EXHAUST, NEW RADIAL TIRES WITH PORTA WALL RED LINES, THE 8 LUG WHEELS WERE BLASTED AND RESTORED FOR FUNCTION AND APPEARANCE. THE WINDOWS AND TOP WORK.

THE INTERIOR NEEDS REDONE, THE TOP HOLDS OUT THE WEATHER BUT LOOKS OLD, THE PAINT LOOKS ORIGINAL, AND HAS SOME SURFACE SPOTS OF RUST, ONLY ONE AREA HAS SOME MINOR FIRST TIME BUBBLES, SEE PIC. THE ENGINE BAY IS STOCK NO DETAIL WAS DONE, JUST GETTING IT TO RUN, STOP AND DRIVE PROPERLY WAS THE MAIN GOAL.
THE FLOORS AND REAR MOUNTS ARE IN GOOD SHAPE, WE PUT ONE PATCH IN THE REAR FLOOR AREA. THE ROCKERS ARE NICE.
THE BUMPERS AND TRIM ARE GOOD, EMBLEMS NEED SOME HELP.
OVERALL IF YOU WANT ONE OF THESE, FEW ARE AVAILABLE, YES IT NEEDS WORK, MOST THAT ARE RESTORED ARE EXPENSIVE. YOU COULD GET IN THIS ONE AND DRIVE IT AS IS AND WORK ON IT AS YOU PLEASE.
PLEASE NOTE!! THE VEHICLE IS DRY STORED AT MY FACILITY IN NC, WILL BRING TO OHIO SOON, OR I CAN SHIP FROM THERE. GOOD TITLE, VIN TAG  AND PAPERWORK.
BOB

Here is a 1960 Pontiac Bonnevile2 Door Hard Top 58,377 Original Miles - WOW Numbers Matching 389 ci V-8 MotorHydromatic Automatic TransmissionPower Steering Power Drum Brakes Great White Exterior Original Paint Chrome is complete and in good conditionOriginal Red Interior No rips, cracks or tears in the seats or on the dashCarpet and Headliner are in great conditionAll gauges are working Heat/ Defrost AM/ FM Radio This is a Unrestored Survivor CarOriginal Paperwork / Owners Manual and Documents Car is local - Call for appointment WE FINANCE/ DELIVER AND SHIP WORLD WIDE, Power Steering , Power Brakes

Wide Track Pontiacs of the '60 are red-hot right now, and not just because the brand is an orphan in the GM family. Collectors have discovered that nobody did luxury and muscle better, and so innovative cars like this 1960 Pontiac Bonneville are at the top of the Pontiac collectability charts. Add in impressive factory colors inside and out and the ultra desirable triple-duce carbs under the hood, and this is your perfect distinctive classic.

With only about 17,000 examples, this was one of the most expensive and lowest production number Pontiacs for 1960.  So just imagine how few you see today, especially in this exceptional condition.  The factory-correct Skymist Blue paint job is bright and sophisticated at the same time, especially when the color-coordinating light blue top is in place.  But it's much more than just distinctive paint that will turn heads with this one. The top-of-the-line Bonneville meant plenty of delicate trim, and amazingly, this car still wears all of it over 55 years later.  The new bold front end for 1960, the double-dipping chrome bumper in front, and the fins that run the whole length of the rear – it all means that nobody will mistake this for anything but a senior Pontiac.

Some people want a triple-black car, but just imagine their surprise when you show them triple-blue just in the interior.  This leather seating is exactly the kind of upgrade that came from the bold and daring Pontiac.  It coordinates nicely with the door panels, carpeting, and dash for a true uniform appearance.  You slip behind the wheel for true 1960s magic. After all, no other period could bring you the cool blue steering wheel with clear upper section.  The stylized dash give you a full readout and then tapers like a lake feeding a stream across the rest of the dash that houses the heat/defrost controls and Wonderbar AM radio (an FM receiver was also added later.)

Under the hood is a very honest 389 cubic-inch block with some very nice upgrades.  We know you spotted the fined bright valve covers, and of course, no one can miss the performance upgrades like the bold Tri-Power carb setup. But more than just big horsepower, power brakes and steering make travel easy.  And it's all backed by a Hydramatic transmission with surprisingly quick reflexes for a vintage gearbox.  Grip is well in hand with modern BF Goodrich T/A rubber.  Those are utilized on the cool factory eight-lug wheels, which are probably worth a small fortune all by themselves.
This Pontiac is the best of everything blue.  But the only way this convertible will make you feel blue is if you miss out on this deal.  Call today!!!

For sale is a 1960 Pontiac Bonneville Convertible located in our Indianapolis Showroom. The 1960 Bonneville has a big smooth and impressive presence along with superior performance and handling for its time. The latter was not just ad copy either as Pontiac pushed its wheels further out toward the fenders than anyone else and created what were considered to be the best-cornering full-size cars in the industry. This exquisite example has gone through an extensive frame off restoration that was completed in 2000. The current owner has only put  roughly 6000 miles on the car since the restoration. This 1960 Pontiac Bonneville Convertible is powered by its original rebuilt 389 CID Tri-Power V8 engine and is backed by a 4-speed Hydra-Matic automatic transmission. The current owner has only put  roughly 6000 miles on the car since the restoration. The exterior is painted in a beautiful light blue exterior color and is accented nicely with a white power convertible top. The interior was also redone nicely in a tri-color blue vinyl with new seat covers and convertible boot professional redone in 2013. This 60 Bonneville Convertible is also outfitted with Kelsey-Hayes 8 Lug Aluminum Alloy wheels which 1960 was the first year they were offered on Pontiacs. Options on this 1960 Pontiac Bonneville Convertible include:  AM/FM Radio with CD Player Power Convertible Top Power Brakes Power Steering Power Windows Seat Belts Vinyl Interior Wide White Wall Radial Tires and Aluminum Alloy Wheels. Some recent maintenance and work completed on this Bonneville include:  New Brake Shoes Wheel Cylinders Master Cylinder Brake Booster and White Wall Coker Radial Tires. This car also comes with the original owners manual three shop manuals receipts from the restoration a car cover and miscellaneous spare parts. If you have been looking for a great car to cruise with the top down take to shows or just cruise down those back country roads this Bonneville convertible will fit the bill nicely.  This 1960 Pontiac Bonneville Convertible for sale is located in our Indianapolis Showroom and can be seen in greater detail including a High Def video at www.GatewayClassicCars.com.
